name: MOVE IN ONE SECOND
description:
Experimental 6 DOF AR VR fitness game for android. Dodge from projectiles and obstacles. Do not stay in same place more than a second. Hold the device by both hands and do a squat to start the game. Move the device away from the projectiles and dodge from obstacles.

**Need ARCore supported device for both AR VR versions.

**For immersive VR experience you need a VR CardBoard viewer with a hole for camera.

For  6DOF  I used ARCore for AR and VR. Did not used Cardboard as no official support available.

Developed in Build your own Game 2020 - Game Jam on Theme: One Second.
